official-title.#text: To amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to strengthen the review authority of the Financial Stability Oversight Council of regulations issued by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives February 27, 2014.

text.#text: Each time the Commission proposes a new rule or regulation, the Commission shall—
